description: Creates a new JDBC connection and provides it as a reference. The connection is either created by a message trigger or during flow init.
requirements: Please upload the JDBC driver class jar file(s) to the flow.

properties.name: createoninit
properties.label: Create during Flow Init
properties.description: If checked, the connection will be created during flow initialization.

properties.name: driver-classname
properties.label: JDBC Driver Classname
properties.description: Provide the fully qualified class name of the JDBC driver.

properties.name: url
properties.label: JDBC URL
properties.description: Provide the JDBC URL to connect to the database.

properties.name: username
properties.label: Username
properties.description: Provide the user name to connect to the database.

properties.name: password
properties.label: Password
properties.description: Provide the password to connect to the database.

properties.name: schema
properties.label: Schema
properties.description: Some databases require a schema name. If so, provide it here.

properties.name: keepaliveselect
properties.label: Keepalive Select Statement
properties.description: Provide a simple select statement which is executed on each timer trigger to keep the connection open. If the connection is closed, it tries to reconnect.

properties.name: requirementsfulfilled
properties.label: Did you upload all required jar files?
